grogs mchog la sogs gsum dang zhes bya ba la / / +grogs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bya ste / /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  mnyan nas chos kyi  don phyin ci ma log par yid la byed pa ni grogs mchog la sogs pa gsum zhes bya ste / /
'di ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i rgyu yin no // / +brtson 'grus che zhes bya ba la / /
theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa la res 'ga' 'jug la res  'ga' mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi / /
rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas na brtson 'grus che ba zhes bya'o // / +dam pa'i mthar phyin zhes bya ba la / /
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas bzhi la the tshom dang som nyi med pa ni dam pa'i chos mthar phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i     // / +gnas bzhi ni / / +sems can gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  sman dang sngags kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis  mi khyab pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#973179#973180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10641# phyi'i dngos PO RNAM PA SNA TSHOGS PA 'grub par byed pa'i LAS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA DANG  rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin GYI SPYOD YUL BSAM GYIS MI  khyab pa dang  DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I YE SHES KYI SPYOD YUL BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA DANG  SMAN DANG SNGAGS KYI MTHU BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA STE / /

column3: brtson 'grus che ba dang  dam pa'i mthar phyin pa dang  gnyis kyis dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin bstan to // /
mchog gi chos kyang sdud ces bya ba la / / +mchog gi chos ni theg pa chen po'i chos te / /
sdud ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos  'jig rten la ring du gnas shing mi nub par bya ba'i phyir srung bar byed de / /
column4: 0.010#TD4035E.TXT.r#164959#164961#TD4035E.TXT.r_7028;TD4035E.TXT.r_7029# de la nye bar spyod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar mos par mi byed ce na / /
column5: 0.010#TD4043E.TXT.r#367619#367620#TD4043E.TXT.r_1564;TD4043E.TXT.r_1565# rgud pa zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar de dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de la skyo BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR STON PAR BYED do // / +rab tu byung bas yang ji ltar rab tu byung ba'i don rnams yang dag  par sgrub par byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' STON PAR BYED DE / /
column6: 0.011#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603091#2603091#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su MI NYAMS PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR SPEL BAR BYED ce na / /
column7: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#174006#174008#TD4035E.TXT.r_8674;TD4035E.TXT.r_8675;TD4035E.TXT.r_8676# dran par mi byed cing / / +yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te / / +ji ltar dran par mi byed cing  yid la mi byed par byed ce na / /
column8: 0.018#TD4062E.TXT.r#2963630#2963630#TD4062E.TXT.r_399# de yang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dag na lus nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'i rnam par  shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#192999#192999#TD4035E.TXT.r_11897# de dag la mkhas pa ga la zhig mngon par chags par byed ces bstan pa'i phyir ro //// /
column10: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#38979#38979#TD4036E.TXT.r_5841;TD4036E.TXT.r_5842# bskyod du zin kyang log par bsgrub pa'i phyir / / +des ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par mi byed do // /
column11: 0.020#TD4069E.TXT.r#642104#642104#TD4069E.TXT.r_2739;TD4069E.TXT.r_2740# zhum pa dang  rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni zhum pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'dzin par byed do // / +rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'jog par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column12: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335454#1335454#TD4037E.TXT.r_2700;TD4037E.TXT.r_2701# gzhan dag la tshul 'chos pa'i phyir yang sbyin par mi byed pa'i phyir ro // / +bkren pa'i tshul du sbyin pa sbyin par yang mi byed de / /
column13: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3010332#3010333#TD4018E.TXT.r_842;TD4018E.TXT.r_843# de dag yod pa nyid de 'bras bur 'brel bar byed pa  nges pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag don dam par yod pa ma yin par ji ltar yid ches par bya zhes 'dri ba la / /
column14: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#12232#12232#TD4036E.TXT.r_1777;TD4036E.TXT.r_1778# don mdor bsdu ba gzhan yang gnyen pos yongs su zin pa dang  'dod pa'i bsod snyoms kyi mtha' rnam par sbang pa dang  bdag nyid dub pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang  tshangs par spyad pa la PHAN PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR YONGS su longs spyod par byed pa yin no // / +ji ltar ji  ltar na gnyen pos yongs su zin pa yin zhe na / /
column15: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#685682#685682#TD4083E.TXT.r_183# thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed pa de bzhin du ser sna can rnams kyi ser sna spong bar byed pa dang  tshe 'di la yang yang dag pa dang  tshegs chung ngus longs spyod  rnams bsgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bstan pa 'di la sdang ba rnams dad pa thob par bya ba dang  mthong ba thob par bya ba dang  lta ba rnam par dag pas ngan song las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang  kun tu sbyor ba thams cad mthar thug pas sdug bsngal ba thams cad las yang dag  par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa'am thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed do // /
column16: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1409667#1409667#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1068;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1069# 'byung ba chen po de rnams chen por gnas shing chen por bkod pa'i phyir ro // / +'byung ba rgyas par byed bas na 'byung ba dag yin no // /
column17: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380218#2380218#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8285;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8286# skur par yang mi byed de yang dag pa ma yin pa tsam du yod pa'i  phyir ro // / +yongs su grub pa la ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yang dag par yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603045#2603045#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8391;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8392# gsum pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes BYA BA NI ZAG PA med pa'o // / +dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas kyang 'jigs pa'i PHYIR SPEL BAR BYED DE / /
column19: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#12746#12747#TD4036E.TXT.r_1859;TD4036E.TXT.r_1860# de dag de la gzhol ba dang  de la bab pa dang  de la 'bab pa de'i sems kyi rgyud la 'jug par byed de / / +des na des bde ba la reg par gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1959951#1959951#TD4032E.TXT.r_6266;TD4032E.TXT.r_6267# rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +ngo bo nyid med par shes pas shes bya'i ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de / /
column21: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1999308#1999308#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3076# dka' thub drag po'i lung 'bogs pa na  don ma yin pa 'dod pa ltar de la phan par 'dod pa'i ston pa'am gzhan yang sdig pa dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro de dag gsung de shi na zhes bya ba ni gcer bu pa gsung de shi na de la GNOD PA BYA BA'I PHYIR DUG dang bcas pa'i zas sbyin par byed pa ltar de la PHAN PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR SBYIN par byed pa bsod nams 'dod pa yang  kha na ma tho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1925715#1925715#TD4032E.TXT.r_970# de ltar sgrib pa'i phyir ma rig pas 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column23: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#48496#48497#TD4036E.TXT.r_7398# ji ltar bsams pa'i don yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914484#2914484#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6541;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6542# de yang mi rung bar ston to // / +ji ltar mi rung bar rigs pa bstan pa'i phyir / /
column25: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196244#2196244#TD4046E.TXT.r_48;TD4046E.TXT.r_49;TD4046E.TXT.r_50# bdag nyid la ltos nas nyams par mi byed do // / +brgyal bag med pa'am / / +brjed ngas pa'am / /
column26: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#12515#12515#TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / / +zas ran pa ma yin pas yongs su longs spyod par mi byed pas na // /

column3: de yang ji ltar srung bar byed ce na / / +ji tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa'i gang zag dang  nyan pa'i gang zag yod pa de tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos ma nub pa yin par khong du chud pas theg  pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa yin ba dang  nyan pa'i gang zag rnams la 'tshe ba dang gnod pa byed pa rnams kyi skyabs byed cing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125702#3125703#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4741;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4742# des  kyang de byed la / / +mi byed na yang le los yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324270#2324270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1631;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1632# ji ltar thos pa bzhin du sgra'i rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pa bstan pa dang  de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / / +mngon par  yid mi ches pa'i gang zag bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324416#2324417#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1646# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / / +mngon par yid mi ches pa'i gang zag bsten pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#36401#36401#TD4036E.TXT.r_5488;TD4036E.TXT.r_5489# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams dang po nyid nas mi skyed pa'i phyir spro ba skyed par byed / / +smon lam 'debs par byed cing dang du len par mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed  pa'i phyir 'dun pa yin no // /
column8: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125657#3125657#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4736# des kyang de byed la mi byed na yang ma mos pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1722612#1722612#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3328# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du ston pa'i mdun du yang bdag gis bshad pa la dge slong  'di phyir zlog par byed khong khro bar byed cing tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang bdag gis bshad pa la / /
column10: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2738570#2738570#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5389;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5390# ci mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni cig car ram rim gyis sam JI LTAR SPONG BAR BYED CE NA / / +mthong ba'i lam la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gis shes pa'i spyod pa ni mtshan ma med pa yin te / /
column11: 0.028#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199123#2199123#TD4046E.TXT.r_432;TD4046E.TXT.r_433# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin na ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir te gtong BAR BYED DO // / +de las bzlog pa ni gtong bar mi byed do // /
column12: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1172881#1172881#TD4047E.TXT.r_7562;TD4047E.TXT.r_7563# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin na ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir de gtong BAR BYED DO // / +de las bzlog pa ni  gtong bar mi byed de // /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915752#915752#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3206;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3207# de bas na ji tsam bdag tu  lta BA YOD PA DE TSAM DU GANG zag la bdag med pa ma rtogs pas / / +gang zag bdag med par rtogs par 'dod bas bdag tu 'dod pa spongs shig ces bstan pa dang  gang zag la bdag med pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'i phyir / /
column14: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199093#2199093#TD4046E.TXT.r_428# gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid la mthun par 'jug par yang mi byed la / /
column15: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1172852#1172852#TD4047E.TXT.r_7557# de bzhin du gzhan gyi sbyor ba la yang gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid la mthun par 'jug par yang mi byed la / /

column3: 'dis ni yongs su smin pa'i las bstan to // / +dam chos cher gsung phyir ni snying rje can // /
yang dag  yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod // / +ces bya ba ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa bstan pa de yang / /
snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i chos gzung zhing 'jig rten du ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dga' ba yongs su smin par bya ba la 'jug ste / /
gong  du bshad pa de dag ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni theg pa chen po'i chos gzungs su gzung ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037816#1037818#TD4054E.TXT.r_7508;TD4054E.TXT.r_7509# bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang ma nges pa dang  nges pa dang  tshe rabs de nyid kyi dang ldan pa'i phyir go rims  bzhin DU RIG PAR BYA'O // / +de la bden PA'I DBANG DU BYAS PA'I chos ni mos pa dang dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te / /
column5: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2993208#2993210#TD4053E.TXT.r_3826;TD4053E.TXT.r_3827# de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa dang  tshe rabs de nyid kyi dus dang ldan pa'i phyir go rims bzhin DU RIG PAR BYA'O // / +'di la bden PA'I DBANG DU BYAS PA'I chos la mos pa dang  dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi  thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba yongs  su smin pa yang theg pa chen po'i chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas pa'i don du smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

dad pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +dad pa'i cha ji tsam zhig sems la skyes na dad pa yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i    phyir tshigs su bcad ba rtsom ste / /
de yang don du na / / +dad pa'i rgyu yang bsags / / +dad pa'i rang bzhin yang phun sum tshogs / /
dad pa'i las dang yang ldan na / / +dad pa yongs su smin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922921#922921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4152# dgu pos bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu po de nyid yon tan dang  bdag nyid chen PO BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922005#922005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4033# de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na yid rno BA YONGS SU SMIN PA  YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906653#906653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub shing skyes pas // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919976#919976#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3750# ldan pa'i don bstan nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i sems can byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthu rnam pa  drug gis sems can gyi don la ji skad 'jug PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: yon tan / / +shes dang zhes bya ba la / / +yon tan shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan khong du chud pa ste / /

de yang ji ltar khong du chud ce na / / +ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par khong du chud pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4018E.TXT.r#3078206#3078211#TD4018E.TXT.r_9667;TD4018E.TXT.r_9668;TD4018E.TXT.r_9669# bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag dang  byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams zhes bya ba  la sogs pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS BYAS pa'am / /
column5: 0.012#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1915703#1915705#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4065# gang yang 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DE dag kyang chos nyid la bkur stir bya ba dang  bla mar bya ba  dang ; /
column6: 0.013#TD4087E.TXT.r#1558328#1558331#TD4087E.TXT.r_45;TD4087E.TXT.r_46# gal te khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas / / +rgyas par 'jig rten 'dir DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI  bar du 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895862#2895864#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3922;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3923# de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA'I YON TAN  dang ldan par shes nas sems dad pa dang  dad pa bskyed de dngos po chen pos rtag tu mchod pa dang gus pas rtag tu mchod na grub pa kun thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column8: 0.016#TD4041E.TXT.r#1272530#1272531#TD4041E.TXT.r_554;TD4041E.TXT.r_555;TD4041E.TXT.r_556# bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub kyi snying por sdig pa can gyi chos dang  bdud kyi  gyul gyi stobs thams cad bcom pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // / +'di LTAR DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA BA NI nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'o // /
column9: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1795564#1795564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12070# DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS LA sbyin pa sbyin par byed na gang zag so so yon gnas yin no // /
column10: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1742790#1742790#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5685# ldan 'das DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS ZHES 'JIG rten du mngon par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to // /
column11: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2167065#2167067#TD4025E.TXT.r_189# 'jam dpal de bzhin DU DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS kyang gyo bar mi mdzad / /
column12: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#197322#197322#TD4035E.TXT.r_12664;TD4035E.TXT.r_12665# de de ltar sems shin tu rnam par grol bas / / +de BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SU 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2243553#2243553#TD4010E.TXT.r_1607# ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis rab tu byung NGO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA dang  de dge ba'i rtsa ba DES DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DON legs par bsams PA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA la / /
column14: 0.020#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570440#1570441#TD4087E.TXT.r_1815# 'khor los sgyur ba ji ltar rgyal po yin pa bzhin DU DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste / /
column15: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1698741#1698743#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_118;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_119# btsun pa ma lags so / / +da ltar byung BA'I DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS PA  'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa / /
column16: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2239097#2239099#TD4010E.TXT.r_1035;TD4010E.TXT.r_1036;TD4010E.TXT.r_1037# dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa bcom pas mchod par 'os pa 'am / / +dgra BCOM PA DANG LDAN PAS dgra bcom pa'o // / +yang DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column17: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#627507#627508#TD4069E.TXT.r_699# tshig gi don bshad pa la mkhas pa nyid bskyed pa'i phyir ni 'di    ltar YANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RIG pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / /
column18: 0.021#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1917080#1917080#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4251# goo ta ma len pa la dga' ba dang  len pas 'bags pa dang  len pa las kun du 'byung ba  dang nye bar len pa don du gnyer ba'i skye dgu LAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYIS chos rnams mngon PAR RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS so // /
column19: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1750922#1750922#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6685# tha dad par smra ba YANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to // /
column20: 0.021#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1915768#1915770#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4071# da ltar byung ba'i dus KYI BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS kyang chos nyid la bkur stir bya ba dang  bla mar bya ba dang  rjed par bya ba dang  mchod par bya ba dag gis bkur stir mdzad cing bla mar mdzad pa dang  rjed  par mdzad pa dang  mchod par mdzad nas bsten cing lan mang du bzhugs par mdzod cig / /
column21: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1710025#1710025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1593# gzhan du NA BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RIG  pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa / /
column22: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1230108#1230108#TD4047E.TXT.r_15449# gang dang yang dag par ldan PAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KHYU mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam 'cha' zhing zhes bya ba nas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so  zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // /
column23: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1698672#1698673#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_108# sh'a ri'i  bu ci gang byung bar gyur pa 'das pa'i DUS KYI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DE dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan / /
column24: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1698711#1698713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_112# gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur BA'I DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DE dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa / /
column25: 0.025#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1917818#1917818#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4329# ma 'ongs pa'i DUS NA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS BYAMS pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column26: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1736719#1736719#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4915# dge slong dag da ltar NI BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN  GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RIG pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / /
column27: 0.025#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1918343#1918343#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4424;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4425# da LTAR BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN     // / +gshegs PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RIG pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa / /
column28: 0.026#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175696#2175696#TD4025E.TXT.r_1470;TD4025E.TXT.r_1471;TD4025E.TXT.r_1472# bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes ba gyi dbang phyug DAM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RNAMS kyi mi ldog pa'i thabs yin no zhes bstan pa yin no // / +bcom ldan 'das de bzhin     // / +gshegs PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RNAMS ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir / /
column29: 0.026#TD4013E.TXT.r#612015#612015#TD4013E.TXT.r_277;TD4013E.TXT.r_278# bde bar gshegs pa de dag la so so re  re la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed kyi lus rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing mngon du phyogs nas bstod do zhes bya ba yin no // / +de ltar rang 'khrungs pa dang  rang 'khrungs ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa grangs med pa yang bstan  la ; /
column30: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570576#1570576#TD4087E.TXT.r_1842;TD4087E.TXT.r_1843# 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du / / +de  BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste / /
column31: 0.027#TD4072E.TXT.r#2098651#2098651#TD4072E.TXT.r_881# DES YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS BCOM ldan 'das mchod par byed pas de lta bu ni bkur sti byed pa'i lta ba'o // /
column32: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1133281#1133281#TD4047E.TXT.r_1732;TD4047E.TXT.r_1733# de dag las nges par thar pa'i rnam pa bzhi ni gnod pa med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'o // / +yang dag par dad pas zhes bya ba ni bdag dul bar bya ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba nas bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i don gyi bar gyi phyir rab tu byung ba ni mngon par 'byung ba'i  bde ba'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir / /
column33: 0.029#TD4041E.TXT.r#1270218#1270218#TD4041E.TXT.r_198# 'di ston PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA BA NI lung rnam par dag pa'o // /
column34: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#629834#629834#TD4069E.TXT.r_1006# brten pa yod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ston PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS BA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SO zhes bya ba gang  yin pa de yin no // /

column3: de ltar khong du chud pa las dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas na 'di ni rgyu yin no // / +yid kyang mi phyed na zhes bya ba la / /
sa dang por chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud nas de phan chad sangs rgyas la  sems mi phyed pa dang  chos dang dge 'dun la sems mi phyed pa ste / /
'di ni dad pa yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin no // / +ting 'dzin myur thob dang zhes bya ba la / /

dad pa yongs su smin par gyur na theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang dpa'  bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i dpag tu med pa rnams myur du thob par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
'bras bu myong dang zhes bya ba la / / +'bras bu ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug la bya ste / /
dad pa yongs su smin na mngon par shes pa drug  kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang 'bras bu myong ba gnyis ni las yin par rig par bya'o // /
rgyal sras rnams ni ston la mos pa'i phyir // / +yang dag yongs su smin pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod // /
ces bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa'  rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mos shing dad par bya ba'i phyir / /
rgyu dang rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan pa'i dad pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

rab tu zhi ba yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +zhi ba     // / +ni nyon mongs pa spongs te nyon mongs pa ji tsam zhig spangs na rab tu zhi ba smin par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste de yang rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba yongs su smin pa yin no zhes ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922398#922402#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA MI 'phrogs pa  YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PAR bstan to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921526#921526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3966# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba JI TSAM ZHIG SKYES NA snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de yang snying rje'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin  dang ; /

column3: shin tu bsdams  shing zhes bya ba la / / +shin tu bsdams pa ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis zin pas mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang bo'i bar du dbang po rnams yul la mi 'jug par bkag pa ni shin tu bsdams pa zhes bya ste / /

dang po sdom pa len pa nas brtsams te / / +zas la tshod rig pa dang   srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal ba dang  dbang po bsdams pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  mthar thug pa'i lam ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2302339#2302344#TD4049E.TXT.r_2584;TD4049E.TXT.r_2585;TD4049E.TXT.r_2586;TD4049E.TXT.r_2587# 'di ni lam gyi mtshan nyid mdor bsdus pa'o // / +yang lam rnam pa lnga ste / / +tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  mthar phyin pa'i lam mo // /
column5: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#956809#956810#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8583# tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong  ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  MTHAR THUG PA'I LAM MO // /
column6: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1023509#1023511#TD4054E.TXT.r_5414;TD4054E.TXT.r_5415# yang lam rnam pa lnga ste / / +tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i  lam dang  mthar phyin pa'i lam mo // /
column7: 0.029#TD4017E.TXT.r#2694470#2694471#TD4017E.TXT.r_5357;TD4017E.TXT.r_5358# lam ni zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga  ste ; / +tshogs sogs pa'i lam dang  lhag par spyod pa'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  MTHAR GYUR PA'I LAM STE / /

column3: lam 'di dag ni rab tu zhi ba smin pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +nyon  mongs rtog pa spangs zhes bya ba la / /

byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin te / / +de yang 'dod chags la rtog pa dang  zhe sdang la rtog pa dang  yod par rtog pa dang  med par rtog pa dang  rtag par rtog pa dang  mi rtag par rtog pa la sogs  pa ste ; /
rtog pa de dag spangs pa ni rab tu zhi ba yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin no // / +bar chad med cing zhes bya ba la / /
'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi gtsang ba bsgom pa dang  zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa bsgom pa dang  gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel par 'byung  ba bsgom pa la bar chad med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#948554#948561#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7492# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir  de'i gnyen po 'dod CHAGS KYI GNYEN POR MI GTSANG BA BSGOM PA DANG  ZHE SDANG GI GNYEN POR BYAMS PA BSGOM PA DANG GTI MUG GI GNYEN POR RTEN CING 'BREL PAR 'BYUNG BA BSGOM PA ni gnyen po'i rnam pa la bsgom pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: rgyun du sgom par byed pa ni rab tu zhi ba yongs su smin pa'i lam rnam pa gcig go // / +dge ba la mngon par dga' zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar drug la spyod de bsgom pa la rang bzhin gyis dga' ba ste / /
'di  ni yongs su smin pa'i lam rnam pa gnyis so // / +rgyal ba'i sras kyi nyon mongs bsal ba'i phyir // /
column4: 1.788#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522109#2522111#TD4020E.TXT.r_455;TD4020E.TXT.r_456;TD4020E.TXT.r_457# bar chad med cing dge la mngon par dga' // / +rgyal ba'i sras  KYI NYON MONGS BSAL BA'I PHYIR // /
column5: 1.788#TD4026E.TXT.r#282222#282225#TD4026E.TXT.r_1246;TD4026E.TXT.r_1247;TD4026E.TXT.r_1248# bar  chad med cing dge la mngon par dga' // / +rgyal BA'I SRAS KYIS NYON MONGS BSAL BA'I PHYIR // /

column3: yang dag yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod // / +ces bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir yongs su smin    pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan ma yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin par 'dod ces bya ba'i don to // /

snying rje yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924252#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam YANG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943298#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6853# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi RIGS PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang MA YIN PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column15: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de SPANG PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA BZHIN RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1396# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher BSHAD PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal BAR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA ZHES BYA BA LA DE ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column18: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column19: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i RGYU BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922004#922004#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4033# de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na yid rno BA YONGS SU SMIN PA  yin no ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column25: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920929#920929#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par GYUR BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column26: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922200#922201#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4053# de'i stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na stobs YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO zhes BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column27: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922743#922744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4127# de yang spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na spong ba'i yan LAG YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column28: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921340#921340#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3945# ni nyon mongs pa spongs te nyon mongs pa JI TSAM ZHIG SPANGS NA rab tu zhi ba smin par 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM STE de yang rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na rab tu zhi BA YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO zhes ston to // /
column29: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924030#924030#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4265;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4266# de yang sbyin pa ji lta bu btang nas sems can rnams ji ltar SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR / / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: de yang snying rje'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin  dang ; / +las gsum dang ldan na snying rje yongs su smin pa ston to // /
snying rje rang bzhin dang ni zhes bya ba la / / +rang bzhin gyi sgra ni rigs la bya ste / /
snying rje'i rigs can zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de'ang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
rigs dang khams dang sa bon dang / / +rang bzhin dag ni don gcig ste // / +ming gi rnam grangs tsam du zad // /

ces bya ba bshad do // / +gzhan sdug mthong ba zhes bya ba la / / +sems can gzhan dag skye ba dang  rga ba dang  'dod pa mi rnyed pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur ba mthong nas / /
de dag gi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa ni snying rje yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
chung du'i sems kyang yang dag rab tu spong // / +zhes bya ba la / / +chung ngu'i sems ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas sems can gzhan gyi don btang nas mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa  ste ; /
sems de spangs nas sems can gyi don du 'khor bar 'gro bar sems pa ni chung du'i sems spong ba zhes bya ste / /
snying rje'i rang bzhin dang  gzhan sdug bsngal ba mthong nas snying rje ba dang  chung du'i sems spong ba dang gsum ni snying rje'i yongs su smin pa'i rgyu yin no // /
khyad par 'gro dang zhes bya ba la / / +gong du smos pa'i rgyu gsum gyis rgyu byas nas snying rje yang je cher 'gro ste / /
sa dang po'i dus pas sa gnyis pa'i dus na snying rje che ba las / /
sa dgu pa'i snying rje bas sa bcu pa'i snying rje che bar gyur pa ni khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ste / /
'di ni snying rje     // / +yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin no // / +'gro ba'i mchog 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694712#694712#TD4083E.TXT.r_1223# 'dir bsgrub pa'i sgo dang  dgag pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba gang cung zad bstan pa de las mi 'da' bas ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ba gsal bar bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881514#2881514#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1910;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1911# tshul khrims kyi nang na mchog ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom PA'O ZHES BYA BA LA / / +sbyin pa'i dngos po la mchog dang mchog ma yin par phye ba bzhin du // /
column6: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#630569#630569#TD4069E.TXT.r_1111# mthun PA ZHES BYA BA NI yang dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yin te mthun pa'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899388#2899388#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4415;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4416# byang chub che la rab mos zhes bya ba ni rab tu mos pa med pa na skyo bas skyo ba'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA LA / / +byang chub chen po la mos pas skyo ba med pa'i rang bzhin du bshad pa de gal te 'dod pa dang mos pa ni skyo ba med pa'i rgyu yin no / /

column3: de lta bu'i snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de sa dang po'i dus na chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro bar rtogs pa de'i tshe / /
column4: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893252#2893253#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3598;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3599;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3600# gzhan bde ba skyed dang GDOD BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' BDE BA myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +byang chub sems dpa' snying rje bas // /

column3: sems can kun las 'phags  pa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa thob pa ni 'gro ba'i mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ste / /
'dis ni las bstan to // / +bzod pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus na grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su len pa ni bzod pa zhes bya ste / /
sdug bsngal ci tsam zhig nyams su len par nus na bzod pa yongs su smin par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924894#924896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4375# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' BA SMIN PAR GYUR BA bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: de yang bzod pa yongs su smin pa'i rgyu dang rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na yongs su smin pa yin par bstan to // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921928#921928#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4023# gong du bshad pa lta bur bzod pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA bzod pa yongs  su smin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922406#922406#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA mi 'phrogs pa  YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PAR BSTAN TO // /

column3: rang bzhin brtan pa zhes bya ba la / / +brtan pa dang  bzod pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  zhe sdang med pa la sogs pa ni  bzod pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so // /
rang bzhin yang 'di'i skabs su rigs la bya ste / / +rang bzhin gyis bzod pa'i rigs yod ces bya ba'i don to // /

gang gi phyir bzod pa'i rigs yod pas na / / +bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'chad pa'i mdo sde ma thos kyang gzhan gyis gnod  par byas pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su len cing zhe sdang mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
so sor brtags pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba la / / +so sor brtags pa ni shes rab la bya ste / / +bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag thos nas chos thams cad sgyu  ma dang ; /
rmi lam dang  smig rgyu lta bur khong du chud pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  gnod pa byas pa dag la bzod cing nyams su len to // /

so sor brtags pas bsgom pa'i don dag ni de lta bu'o // / +yang na gzhan dag gis bdag la gnod pa byas pa dang  bdag gis grang ba dang    tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba 'di dag kyang tshe snga ma la bdag gis gzhan la gnod pa byas pa'i rgyus tshe 'dir bdag sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba yin te / /
de yang bdag gis gnod pa byas na ni tshe rabs gzhan du yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur bas gnod pa  ci tsam byung yang bzod par bya'o snyam du sems pa ni so sor brtags pa bsgoms pa zhes bya ste / /
rang bzhin brtan pa dang  so sor brtags pa gnyis ni bzod pa yongs su smin pa'i rgyu yin no // / +sdug bsngal grang la sogs pa rtag mi mjed // /

ces bya ba la / / +sems  can yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir grang ba dang  tsha ba dang  sprang bu dang  sha sbrang dang  bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams byung yang nyams su len cing sems mi ldog pa ni mi mjed pa zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915227#915228#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3144# bdag gi don sgrub pa dang  gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang  de kho na'i don dang  mthu'i don dang  SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYA BA DANG  sems  CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYA BA DANG  bla na med pa'i byang chub bo zhes smos pa las / /

column3: 'di ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin no // / +khyad par 'gro dang zhes bya ba la / / +sa bcu gong nas gong du bzod pa spangs shing shas je che je cher gyur pa ni khyad par 'gro ba zhes bya ste / /
'di bzod pa'i las rnam pa gcig go // / +de la dge ba la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la / /
bzod pa dang  ldan pa rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la dga' ste / / +'di ni bzod pa'i las rnam pa gnyis so // /
bzod pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod ces bya ba la / / +gong du bshad pa lta bur bzod pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na bzod pa yongs  su smin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921731#921731#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3997# de YANG BZOD PA YONGS SU SMIN PA'I RGYU DANG RANG BZHIN DANG  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA YONGS SU SMIN PA yin par bstan to // /

column3: yid rno ba yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +dran pa dang shes rab gnyis po yid rno ba zhes bya ba'o // /
yang na yid rno ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rnam grangs kyi ming ste / / +yid rno ba zhes kyang  bya ; /
shes rab ces kyang bya ste / / +de bas na mdo sde de dag las / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi dbang du byas nas shes rab can yid rno ba mkhas pa'o zhes gsungs so // /

don du na de kho na khong du ma chud pa bskal pa grangs med pa gcig gi     // / +bar du nyan pa dang sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba la zhugs pa'i gang zag mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi shes rab la yid rno ba zhes bya ste / /
de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na yid rno ba yongs su smin pa  yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921523#921524#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921188#921189#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3922# DAD PA YONGS SU SMIN TO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922200#922201#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4053# de'i stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA STOBS YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO ZHES BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922743#922744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4127# de yang spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA spong ba'i yan LAG YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: rnam smin dag cing zhes bya ba la tshe rabs snga ma la dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba byas pas gar skyes kyang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po thams cad tshang ba dang rang bzhin  gyis shes rab rno ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga thob pa ni rnam par smin pa dag pa zhes bya ste / /
'dis ni yid rno ba rnam par smin pa'i rgyu bstan to // / +thos pa la sogs mi brjed ces bya ba la / /

gong du dran pa dang shes rab gnyis la yid rno ba zhes bya'o zhes bstan te / / +dran  pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa dang  sngon lus kyi sgo nas las ci byas pa dang ngag gi sgo nas tshig ci smras pa rnams dran zhing mi brjed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
de bzhin legs smras nyes smras rab tu chud // / +ces bya ba la / /
shes rab dang ldan pas na bdag dang gzhan gyis legs par smras pa dang  nyes par smras pa ngos zin cing rtogs te / /
'dis tshig 'di smras pa ni ma nor te legs par smras pa yin no zhes rtogs / / +'dis ni tshig 'di smras pa ni nor te nyes par smras pa yin no zhes rtogs te / /
mnyan pa la sogs mi brjed pa dang  legs par smras pa dang  nyes par smras pa khong du chud pa ni yid rno ba'i rang bzhin no // /
dran pa yin te zhes bya ba ni mnyan pa la sogs pa mi brjed par ni dran par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221509#1221510#TD4047E.TXT.r_14211# de dag gis ma rtogs pa'i don yang rtogs PAR BYED LA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA / /

column3: blo chen skye ba rung zhes bya ba la / / +ji ltar byas pa  mi brjed pa dang  legs nyes kyang ngos zin te bye brag byed pa'i shes rab des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes bskyed pa bas blo chen skye ba rung zhes bya ba ste / /
'di ni las so // / +de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes ni sa dang por chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i    mtshan nyid du rtogs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la bya'o // /
stobs dang ldan pa bskyed pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la stobs zhes bya ba dang  mthu zhes bya ba don gcig ste / /
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags nas  sgrib pa gnyis spangs te / /

chos kyi dbyings rtogs par nus pa ni stobs zhes bya'o // / +de'i stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na stobs yongs su smin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921523#921531#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3966;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3967# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 5.960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922362#922363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4076# stobs rnyed pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las  GSUM DANG LDAN NA STOBS YONGS SU SMIN PA RNYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922004#922004#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4033# de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA yid rno BA YONGS SU SMIN PA  YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922744#922744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4127# de yang spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA SPONG ba'i yan lag YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922404#922404#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA mi 'phrogs pa  YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PAR bstan to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894305#2894305#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3729# de lta bu'i sbyin pa BTANG BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA gnyis RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: dge ba gnyis kyis  khams gnyis rgyas pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +dge ba gnyis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba dang  ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'o // /
khams kyi sgras ni tshogs de gnyis kyi sa bon la bya ste / / +bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsod nams kyi sa bon rtas par byed / /
ye  shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang ye shes kyi sa bon rtas par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
'dis ni stobs yongs su smin pa'i rgyu bstan to // / +'bras bu skye ba'i rten du rung ba'i mchog // /
ces bya ba'i rten zhes bya ba ni lus la bya ste / / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags  pas gzung 'dzin spangs nas stong pa nyid khong du chud de / /
sangs rgyas kyi sa thob pa ni 'bras bu skye ba zhes bya ste / / +de lta bu nus pa'i lus thob par gyur na / /
'bras bu skye ba'i rten du rung ba'i mchog // / +ces bya ste / / +'dis ni stobs kyi rang bzhin bstan to // /
mchog gi sgras ni  lus de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa las 'phags par bstan to // /
bsam pa grub cing zhes bya ba la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa de dag nyid ci bsams pa rnams kyang de bzhin du 'grub la / /
sems can gyi bsam pa yang yongs su khengs par  byed ces bya ba'i don to // /

'di ni stobs kyi las rnam pa gcig go // / +'gro ba'i mchog tu gyur zhes bya ba la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa de ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa ni sems can kun las shes pas 'phags bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa ni sems     // /
can kun las lus mdzes pa dang longs spyod kyis 'phags zhes bya ba'i don to // /

'di ni stobs yongs su smin pa'i las gnyis pa'o // / +stobs rnyed pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las  gsum dang ldan na stobs yongs su smin pa rnyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 5.960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922193#922195#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4053# DE'I STOBS KYI RGYU DANG  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA STOBS YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN no zhes bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922684#922687#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4120;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4121# PA'I MTSHAN NYID DO ZHES BYA BA LA / / +mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA mi 'phrogs PA YONGS SU SMIN PAR 'gyur ba yin NO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: mi 'phrogs pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams kyi mthu dang  ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mthu dang ldan pas bdud la sogs  pas ni spyod pa bsgyur bar mi nus pa la / /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920907#920907#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3884;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3885# de dgu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' DE YONGS SU SMIN PA'I mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dga' BA YONGS SU SMIN PA LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA ZHES BYA BA LA / /

column3: mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914541#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam YANG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943298#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6853# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par MI RIGS PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma YIN PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column15: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de SPANG PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA bzhin RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1396# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher BSHAD PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal BAR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column18: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column19: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i RGYU BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad ZHUGS PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920929#920929#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par GYUR BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column25: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column26: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912825#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column27: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column28: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924892#924892#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column29: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925103#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column30: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921340#921340#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3945# ni nyon mongs pa spongs te nyon mongs pa ji tsam zhig spangs na rab tu zhi ba smin par 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM STE de yang rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba yongs su smin pa yin no zhes ston to // /

column3: de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na mi 'phrogs pa  yongs su smin pa yin par bstan to // /
column4: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921736#921736#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3997# de yang bzod PA YONGS SU SMIN PA'I RGYU DANG RANG BZHIN DANG  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PAR BSTAN TO // /

column3: chos bzang rigs pa rnam par dpyod pa'i sems // / +zhes bya ba la / / +chos bzang po ni theg pa chen po'i chos te / /
theg pa chen po'i chos la rigs pa rnam pa bzhis dpyad cing bsam pa las / / +chos kyi don gtan la phab cing  the tshom med pa'i sems rnyed pa ni rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems zhes bya ste / /
'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu'o // / +de la rigs pa bzhi ni ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  gtan tshigs bsgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891300#891305#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_321;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_322;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_323# yang na 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa la bya ste / / +bya ba SGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  LTOS PA'I RIGS PA DANG  gtan tshigs  SGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  CHOS NYID KYI RIGS PA STE / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#892154#892159#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_428;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_429;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_430;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_431# rigs pa bzhis dpyod par byed de / / +rigs pa bzhi ni / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  BYA BA BYED PA'I RIGS PA  dang ; /
column6: 1.788#TD4049E.TXT.r#2305552#2305555#TD4049E.TXT.r_3141# LTOS PA'I RIGS PA DANG  BYA BA BYED PA'I RIGS PA DANG  GTAN TSHIGS BSGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  chos nyid kyi rigs  pa'o ; / /
column7: 0.012#TD4041E.TXT.r#1273643#1273644#TD4041E.TXT.r_739# RIGS PA DANG LDAN PA NI RIGS PA BZHI PO LTOS PA'I RIGS PA DANG  GTAN TSHIGS SGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  BYA BA BYED PA'I RIGS PA DANG  CHOS NYID KYI RIGS PA bzhi dang ldan pa'o // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267354#267357#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6725# 'di lta ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  BYA BA BYED PA'I RIGS PA DANG  GTAN TSHIGS SGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  chos nyid kyi  rigs pa'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2938072#2938075#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9639;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9640# rnam pa bzhi dang rnam pa gsum yin no zhes bya ba LA RIGS PA BZHI STE / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  BYA BA BYED PA'I RIGS PA DANG  'thad pa BSGRUB PA'I RIGS PA DANG  CHOS NYID KYI RIGS PA STE / /

column3: de la rgyu las brten nas 'bras bu skye ba'i rim pa la ltos pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ste / /
dper na gzugs dang mig gi dbang po la brten nas / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ltos pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o // /
rgyu rkyen gyi mthu las mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes nas  gzugs la lta ba la sogs pa rang gi las byed pa ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o // /
gtan tshigs sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni gsum ste / / +'bras bu'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin gyi rgyu dang  mi dmigs pa'i rgyu'o // /
de la 'bras bu'i rgyu ni gang na du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes    bya ba lta bu'o // /
rang bzhin gyi rgyu ni shing zhes bya bas shing sha pa dang thang shing la sogs pa kun la khyab pas na 'di ni shing yin te / /

ci'i phyir zhe na / / +shing sha pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +mi dmigs pa'i rgyu ni sa phyogs 'di na dmigs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid  kyi bum pa mi snang ba ni bum pa med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / / +ma byung yang rung / / +ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed la sogs pa'i chos nyid 'di ni ye nas gnas pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.012#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122225#3122227#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4314;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4315;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4316;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4317# de la lung shin tu rnam par ma dag pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su ma dag pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RNAMS BYUNG YANG RUNG // / +ma BYUNG YANG RUNG STE / /
column5: 0.024#TD4018E.TXT.r#3047118#3047119#TD4018E.TXT.r_5586;TD4018E.TXT.r_5587;TD4018E.TXT.r_5588# de bzhin gshegs PA BYUNG YANG RUNG / / +ma BYUNG YANG RUNG STE / / +chos nyid DE NI GNAS PA'O ZHES BYA BA LA sogs par ro // /

column3: rtag tu bdud kyis  bar chad byed pa med // / +ces bya ba la / / +nam byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshe bdud la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul te / /

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dor du bcug kyang 'dor du mi btub pa dang  mu stegs pa la sogs pas  gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta ba sun phyung nas lta ba gzhan sun phyung bar brtsams kyang lta ba 'dor du mi btub pa ni // /
rtag tu bdud kyis bar chad byed pa med // / +ces bya ba ste / / +'di ni mi 'phrogs pa la yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin no // /
khyad par rnyed dang zhes bya ba la / / +rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems des rim par gnas pa la yang zhing shas je che je cher gyur pa ni khyad par rnyed pa zhes bya'o // /
de yang dper na sa dang po'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems pas / / +sa gnyis pa'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems shas che  bas na khyad zhugs pa yin te / /
column4: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692616#692616#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006# 'chos par mi byed pa ni nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349636#2349636#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4467# rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrub pa'i  rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /

column3: 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa rnam par smin pa'i las rnam pa gcig go // / +gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin zhes bya ba la / /
gzhan gyi phyogs ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi gtsug lag dang ldan pa la bya ste / /
rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  ldan pas mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i phyogs ni sun 'byin par nus / /
bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi gzhung nyid ni gzugs par nus zhes bya ba'i don to // /
'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i las yongs su smin pa'i las rnam pa gnyis pa'o // / +mi 'phrogs pa yongs su smin par byed     // /
column4: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1187060#1187060#TD4047E.TXT.r_9428;TD4047E.TXT.r_9429;TD4047E.TXT.r_9430# chos kyang rnam pa gnyis te / / +don dang yi ge'i dbye bas so // / +de dag las kyang don la brtan par bya'i yi ge la ni ma yin te / /

column3: pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la / / +mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na mi 'phrogs pa yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922403#922403#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA MI 'PHROGS PA  yongs su smin pa yin par bstan to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922360#922360#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4076# stobs rnyed PA YONGS SU SMIN PA'I MTSHAN NYID DO ZHES BYA BA NI stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las  gsum dang ldan na stobs yongs su smin pa RNYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: spong ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs  su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
spong ba ni sa dang po'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs pa las spong ba zhes bya ste / /
de'i grogs su gyur pa'i chos rnam pa lnga ni spong ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya'o // /
lnga po yang gang zhe na / / +dad pa dang  gyo  med pa dang  sgyu med pa dang  lus la nad med pa dang  shes rab bo // /
de yang spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na spong ba'i yan lag yongs su smin pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur RO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912958#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2837# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par BYED DO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam YANG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921524#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914119#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags SO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column15: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981741#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column18: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column19: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922004#922004#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4033# de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA yid rno BA YONGS SU SMIN PA  YIN NO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya CHER BSHAD PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896435#896435#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal BAR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922201#922201#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4053# de'i stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  LAS GSUM DANG LDAN NA STOBS YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN NO ZHES BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: dge  ba stsogs dang zhes bya ba la / / +dge ba'i sgras ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang  ye shes kyi tshogs la bya ste / /
column4: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2870159#2870160#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_296;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_297# yang na gnyis kyi  sgras ni / / +ye shes kyi tshogs DANG BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS LA BYA STE / /

column3: de gnyis brtsams zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de ni spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu'o // / +yan lag lnga las 'di ni dad pa dang sbyar ro // /
gnas kyang brtson par rung  zhes bya ba dang  gnas kyi sgras ni lus la bya ste / /

nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa dge ba byed pa na lus la gnod pa dang  mi bde ba med cing brtson 'grus rgyun du rtsom par gnas pa'i lus la ni gnas kyang brtson par rung ba zhes bya ste / /
'di ni spang ba'i yan  lag gi rang bzhin no // / +yan lag lnga las 'di ni lus la nad med par sbyar ro // /
dben la dga' dang zhes bya ba la / / +'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas shing drung brag phug la sogs pa'i gnas dben pa dag na gnas par dga' ba ni dben pa mchog la dga' ba zhes bya ste / /
'di ni spong  ba'i yan lag gi las rnam pa gcig ste / / +gyo med pa dang sgyu med pa dang sbyar ro // /
dge ba la mngon par dga'o zhes bya ba la / / +dge ba'i sgra theg pa chen po'i chos la bya ste / /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#946247#946247#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7208;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7209;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7210# chos la  dmigs par 'dod pa ste // / +zhes BYA BA LA / / +de la chos zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gsung rab yan lag bcu GNYIS LA BYA STE / /

column3: chos de dag nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa la dga' ba ni dge ba la mngon par dga'o zhes    bya'o ; / /
'di ni spong ba'i yan lag gi las rnam pa gnyis pa ste / / +'di ni shes rab dang sbyar ro // /

rgyal ba'i sras kyi yan lag ldan pa yis // / +yang dag yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod // / +ces bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spong ba'i yan lag rnam  pa lnga rnam pa rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las dang ldan na spong pa'i yan lag yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dod do // /
bdag yongs su smin pa'i rnam pa dgu'i che ba las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa nas spong ba'i yan lag  gi bar du chos dgu dang ldan na bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa zhes bya ste / /
dgu pos bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu po de nyid yon tan dang  bdag nyid chen po bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921190#921190#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3922# dad pa yongs su smin to ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906653#906653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub shing skyes pas // /

column3: che ba yang  rnam pa gnyis so // / +gang zhe na / / +gzhan yongs su smin pa'i bya ba'i rten du gyur pa dang  chos kyi lus 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o // /
de ltar dngos po rnam pa dgu smin pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa lta bu'o // /
dngos po rnam pa dgu ni dad pa nas spong  ba'i yan lag gi bar du dgu ste / /
gang du bshad pa ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de chos rnam pa dgu'i gzhi'am rten tam gnas de lta bur gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
pha rol yongs su smin byed rung dang ldan // / +zhes bya bas gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i rten du gyur par bstan  te ; /
column4: 0.022#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522243#2522244#TD4020E.TXT.r_483;TD4020E.TXT.r_484# de ltar dngos po rnam dgus smin pa'i  bdag / / +pha ROL YONGS SU SMIN BYED RUNG DANG LDAN // /
column5: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#282573#282575#TD4026E.TXT.r_1307;TD4026E.TXT.r_1308# de ltar dngos po rnam dgu smin pa'i bdag / / +pha ROL YONGS SU SMIN BYED RUNG DANG LDAN // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' de chos rnam pa dgu'i rten du gyur pas sems can yongs su smin par byed par nus shing sems can yongs su smin pa'i mthu yod la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas su yang gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#923020#923021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4163;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4164# dge ba rtag tu rab tu 'phel ba'i  dngos po zhes bya bas rtag tu chos kyi lus 'phel ba bstan te / / +byang chub sems dpa' CHOS DGU'I RTEN DU GYUR PAS NA SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PAR NUS par yang ma zad kyi / /

column3: dge ba rtag tu rab tu 'phel ba'i  dngos po zhes bya bas rtag tu chos kyi lus 'phel ba bstan te / /
byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu'i rten du gyur pas na sems can yongs su smin par byed par nus par yang ma zad kyi / /
column4: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922985#922989#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4161;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4162# zhes bya bas GZHAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYA BA'I RTEN DU GYUR PAR bstan  te ; / +byang chub sems dpa' de chos rnam PA DGU'I RTEN DU GYUR PAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PAR NUS SHING SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PA'I mthu YOD LA SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA'I GNAS su yang gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983254#983255#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11905# sgrub par byed pa'i BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DANG  bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can dang  sgrub pa'i chos gsum yod par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dus thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur te bdag gi rgyud la dge     // /
ba bskyed pa'i gzhi dang rten du yang gyur ces bya ba'i don to // / +rtag tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen mchog 'gyur // /
zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de chos rnam pa dgu dang yang ldan / / +sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i mthu yang yod / /

rtag tu  dge ba'i chos kyang 'phel bas na / / +sems can rnams tshe 'dir zang zing gis phan btags nas dge ba la bkod de phan par byed pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod de bde bar byas pas na 'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen mchog gyur pa zhes bya ste / /
pha ma dang he du gnyen bshes pas sems can la phan pa lhag par mdzad pas na gnyen mchog tu gyur pa'o // /
ci'i phyir zhe na / / +pha mas ni 'dir zang zing gis phran tshegs tsam gyi phan 'dogs par nus kyi / /

tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das par 'jog par  mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +sems can yongs su smin pa'i rnam par dbye ba las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig go zhes bya ba la gong du gang la bslab par bya ba la rnam pa bdun du gzhag pa las 'di yan chad bdag yongs su smin pas brtsams pa'i bar du rnam pa lnga bshad  nas ; /
column4: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804497#804497#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6304# mngal nas skye ba dang  sgo nga las skye ba'i sems can du gyur pa'i phyir ro //// /

column3: da sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las brtsams te / / +ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig gis ston to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#923945#923945#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4256;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4257# sbyor ba gang gis sems  can RNAMS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PAS PHA rol tu phyin pa rnams sgrub PA STON TO ZHES BYA BA la / / +tshigs SU BCAD PA BCU GCIG GIS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN pa las 'di yan CHAD TSHIGS SU BCAD PA BZHI ni bstan zin to // /

column3: de la bdag yongs su smin par byed pa'i rjes la sems can yongs su smin par  byed par bstan pa la 'brel bar lta ba ci yod ce na / /
