column22: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892212#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column25: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#283022#283023#TD4026E.TXT.r_1378;TD4026E.TXT.r_1379# de'i rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun ba dag phan tshun mthun pas rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro // / +bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column26: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981741#981741#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column27: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column28: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya CHER BSHAD PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: bzod pa ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +pha rol gnod par byed pa phan byed blo // /
column4: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921723#921726#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3996;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3997# sdug bsngal ci tsam zhig nyams su len par nus na bzod PA YONGS SU SMIN PAR GYUR pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925685#925685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA'I skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug GIS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  LTAR SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYAS pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: nyes pa byas pa drag po rab tu bzod // / +ces bya ba smos te / / +sems can gzhan gyi srog dang srid dang longs spyod la sogs pa med par byed pa ni pha rol gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ste / /
gnod par byed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'  gnod pa la klan kar snyad mi dgos te gnod par byas pa 'di dag la bzod par byas na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1716380#1716380#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2528# dge slong dag dbang PO'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA la brten nas 'bras BU'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA rab tu shes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1260527#1260527#TD4051E.TXT.r_4114# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SHES rab KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas de las GZHAN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RNAMS bsgoms PAS YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR 'GYUR RO ZHES 'byong ngo // /

column3: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pas 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen  yin no snyam du sems shing smra ba ni / /
column4: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1716380#1716380#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2528# dge slong dag dbang PO'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA la brten nas 'bras BU'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA rab tu shes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: pha rol gnod par byed pa phan byed blo // / +zhes bya ba'o // / +srog dang srid la 'bab pa'i nyes pa byas na yang zhe sdang mi ldang zhing nyams su mi len na / /
slar gnod pa'i len mi ldon pa ni nyes par byed pa drag po bzod pa zhes bya'o // /
ji ltar yongs  su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +thabs shes gnod par byed pa'i bzod pa yis // /

gnod par byed pa dag ni dge la bkod // / +ces bya ba smos te / / +gnod par byed pa rnams la / / +'di ni phan 'dogs pa yin no snyam du sems shing tshig tu de skad smras pa nyid thabs shes pa  zhes bya'o // /

phan 'dogs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +tshe 'dir phan 'dogs pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du phan 'dogs pa'o // / +tshe 'dir phan 'dogs pa ni nyes pa drag po byas pa rnams la yang gnod pa drag po dag bzod do // /
slar gnod pa'i lan ma glan pas na tshe  'dir phan 'dogs so // /
tshe rabs gzhan du phan 'dogs pa'i thabs shes pa'i sems kyis gnod par byed pa rnams la phan 'dogs so snyam du sems shing khyod kyis phan 'dogs so zhes smras pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du sems te / /

bdag gis gnod par byas na yang  slar phan 'dogs so zhes smras pa dang sbyar na sems can 'di ni sems can chen po zhig ste snyam nas de la dad pa skye zhing de'i dbang du gyur pa dang  tshe 'dir dge ba byed pa la bkod de tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe gzhan du phan     // /
column4: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#923768#923768#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4240# ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang ldan pa rnams sems can la tshe 'dir zang zing sna tshogs kyis phan btags nas dge ba la 'god pas bde ba la bkod  pa DANG TSHE RABS GZHAN DU MTHO RIS DANG MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA THOB PAR BYAS PAS PHAN PA LA BKOD DE SEMS can la byams par dgongs pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba ltar / /

column3: 'degs pa'o // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column4: 0.009#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348753#1348754#TD4037E.TXT.r_4466;TD4037E.TXT.r_4467# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus shes pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rnam par 'phel bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu dam pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /// /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924870#924872#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bzod pa ji lta bus sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column7: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836088#1836088#TD4039E.TXT.r_2610;TD4039E.TXT.r_2611# gnas pa'i rgyun du byed cing byang bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / /
column8: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1223230#1223231#TD4047E.TXT.r_14468;TD4047E.TXT.r_14469# mi 'byung    ba dang rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o / / +de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bag yod pas mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir / /
column9: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925451#925453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# shes rab JI LTA BUS JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column10: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#198080#198080#TD4035E.TXT.r_12782# brtson 'grus brtsams pa de la gnas pas 'dod pa la  'dun pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas par mi byed la / /
column11: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2785500#2785503#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11747;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11748# mi nyal ba ni rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i sbyor ba dag gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#283099#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1388;TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i phyir tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang  thabs shes pa gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa de  dag gis gnod pa byed pa rnams dang par byas nas dge ba yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas so // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems CAN JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE tshigs su bcad pa / /
column13: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317382#1317385#TD4037E.TXT.r_171;TD4037E.TXT.r_172# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa  rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags ni 'di dag yin te / /

column15: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925267#925267#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4424# bsam gtan JI LTA BUS JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA  las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column17: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907910#2907910#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5607# yang na brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bsgrubs pa'i chos la dran pa'i dbang pos mi brjed par byed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o // /

column23: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3034503#3034506#TD4018E.TXT.r_3989# de la rim zhes bya ba ni 'jungs pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa dang  ngang tshul ngan pa'i gnyen por tshul khrims dang  ngan  du smra ba la sogs pa khro ba'i gnyen por ji mi snyam zhing bzod pa dang  le lo'i gnyen por brtson 'grus dang  mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i gnyen por bsam gtan dang  ma rig pa'i gnyen por shes rab dang  thabs med pa'i gnyen por shes rab kyis thabs la mkhas pa dang  smon  pa med pa'i gnyen por bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam dang  rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi stobs chung ba'i gnyen por stobs dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa'i mi shes pa thams cad kyi gnyen por ye shes te / /

column27: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348971#1348971#TD4037E.TXT.r_4480# sems  kun nas dkris pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de spang ba'i phyir mgo la me 'bar ba gsod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus khyad par can dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad yongs su tshol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus tshol ba dang   yongs su btsal ba'i chos de dag nyid la ji ltar mthun pa dang  ji ltar 'os par chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos nan tan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i brtson 'grus dang  byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus ni snga ma bzhin du rnam  pa bcu gcig tu blta bar bya'o // /

column29: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1860576#1860576#TD4039E.TXT.r_5291;TD4039E.TXT.r_5292# la sbyar bar bya ba dang  lhag pa'i sems la bag yod par bya ba dang  lhag pa'i shes rab la ston pa'i bstan pa la brtson par bya ba'i phyir snying tshim par brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o // / +gal te le los gnas par byed na ni de la nyes  dmigs gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste / /

column13: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.021#TD4044E.TXT.r#382570#382571#TD4044E.TXT.r_213;TD4044E.TXT.r_214# so sor brtags nas brtson pa de'i bya ba de mngon par rdzogs par  byed ces bya ba'o // / +sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so sor brtags nas sbyor ba nyid ni sbyor ba zhes bya ste / /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.021#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954061#1954061#TD4032E.TXT.r_5295;TD4032E.TXT.r_5296# des gzhan dag gis gsod pa dang 'ching ba dang rdeg pa la sogs pa byas pa la slar gnod pa mi byed pas ji mi snyam par byed pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyis ni yon tan rnams  'phel BAR BYED DO ZHES BYA ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i phyir spro ba ni brtson 'grus te / /
column18: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#283099#283100#TD4026E.TXT.r_1388;TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i phyir tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang  thabs shes pa gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa de  dag gis gnod pa byed pa rnams dang par byas nas dge ba yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas so // / +brtson 'grus JI LTA BUS SEMS CAN JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column19: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896432#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal BAR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags SO ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam YANG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column26: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column27: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348753#1348753#TD4037E.TXT.r_4466;TD4037E.TXT.r_4467# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus shes pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rnam par 'phel bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu dam pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /// /
column28: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911264#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO // /
column29: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column30: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column31: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO // /
column32: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934809#934809#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5782;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5783# chos kyi dbyings la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA la / /
column33: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2414790#2414790#TD4019E.TXT.r_974;TD4019E.TXT.r_975# don dam par sems can yang mi dmigs la /// / +rtag tu sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA'I brtson pa yang byed do // /
column34: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907934#2907934#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5610# chos gang brtson  'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos de dag gi dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi gson te / /
column35: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925244#925244#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4421;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4422# byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can rnams la tshe 'dir phan btags pa dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pas sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +de la brtson    'grus kyis tshe 'dir dge ba'i sems gcig la bkod pa ni tshe 'dir phan btags pa'o // /

column3: brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir / / +de yang nan tan mchog la gnas nas su // /
column4: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348825#1348834#TD4037E.TXT.r_4473;TD4037E.TXT.r_4474# rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; / +lhur sbyor ba'i phyir gus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  so sor brtags shing brtags shing dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams  cad kyis mi 'khrugs shing gzhan du bsgyur du med pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  khyad par thob pa chung ngu dang  ngan don tsam gyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column5: 0.016#TD4044E.TXT.r#382474#382474#TD4044E.TXT.r_200;TD4044E.TXT.r_201# zhes bya ba'i don to // / +brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa drug ste / /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968851#968851#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10088# don dam pa'i bden par mthong ba dang  kun rdzob kyi bden par mthong ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#302532#302532#TD4026E.TXT.r_4919;TD4026E.TXT.r_4920# 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam la    gnas yongs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +don chen po'i brtson 'grus ni / /
column8: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1935278#1935279#TD4032E.TXT.r_2496;TD4032E.TXT.r_2497;TD4032E.TXT.r_2498# tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni bde 'gro'o // / +bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu NI SEMS CAN YONGS SU MI gtong ba'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348492#1348492#TD4037E.TXT.r_4438# nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  phas kyi rgol ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi gyos pa'i phyir mi gyo ba dang  gus par sbyor ba can yin pa'i phyir brtan pa dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad yang dag par 'grub par nye bar gnas pa'i  phyir dpag tu med pa dang  thob par bya ba'i don gyi lam phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang ldan pa dang  thob par bya ba'i don dang ldan pa thob par smon pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rtag tu sbyor ba can yin pa'i phyir  rgyas pa dang  brtson 'grus rtsom pa des mtho bar sems pa med pa'i phyir nga rgyal med pa ste / /
column10: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#1253881#1253881#TD4051E.TXT.r_3089# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bya ba byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang  gnod pa mi BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column11: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1182960#1182960#TD4047E.TXT.r_8885;TD4047E.TXT.r_8886# mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs pas nyon mongs pa nyid dang bral ba'i phyir  yang thabs dang ldan pa'o // / +don chen po la sbyor ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349160#1349161#TD4037E.TXT.r_4503;TD4037E.TXT.r_4504# bdag nyid kyis mang du thos pa'i stobs bskyed pas phyin ci ma log par zin pas sems gnas PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR / / +brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i legs par zin pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925141#925141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa NI NAN TAN MCHOG LA GNAS PA zhes bya'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907934#2907934#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5610# chos gang brtson  'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos de dag gi dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi gson te / /

column3: rgyal sras sems can mang po  smin par byed // / +ces bya ba smos te / /
de yang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang sbyar te / / +brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // /

go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233924#233932#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548# GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  zhum pa MED PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  mi BSKYOD PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  CHOG MI SHES PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732195#2732205#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4558;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4559# brtson 'grus kyi dbang po la ste mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga po dag gis rnam pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus de yongs su bstan pa yin te / / +go CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  MI ZHUM PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG MI 'KHRUL PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG CHOG MI SHES PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS SO // /

column7: 0.007#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983168#983173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11889;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11891# brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te / / +rtag PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG RGYA che ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column8: 0.008#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#964531#964532#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9583# dge ba la sems spro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi brtson 'grus so // / +le los sems  ma gyengs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi bsam gtan zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.010#TD4080E.TXT.r#592#595#TD4080E.TXT.r_63# dge ba'i las rnams LA SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  brtsams pa mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus te / /
column10: 0.010#TD4048E.TXT.r#1693205#1693206#TD4048E.TXT.r_1323# chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column11: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119438#3119440#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3992# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  dge ba LA SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  sems can gyi don LA SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS SO // /
column12: 0.011#TD4053E.TXT.r#2990928#2990930#TD4053E.TXT.r_3532# GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column13: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034691#1034693#TD4054E.TXT.r_7088# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column14: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227434#227438#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson  'grus dang  dge ba'i chos sdud PA'I SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  sems can gyi don LA SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS SO zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /
column15: 0.012#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881443#2881447#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1903;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# bzod pa'i dngos po ni gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni GO CHA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS LA SOGS pa'o // /
column16: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227652#227653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1760# 'di lta ste / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  SBYOR BA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do // /
column17: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348720#1348720#TD4037E.TXT.r_4464;TD4037E.TXT.r_4465# de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dkar po'i chos sgrub par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS GANG YIN pa dang  skyes pa rnams gnas par byed pa dang  mi nyams par byed pa dang  'phel zhing rgyas  par byed PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS GANG YIN pa'o // / +de la byang chub SEMS DPA'I BRTSON 'GRUS LAS yongs su dag par byed pa ni las rnam pa gsum po lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  yid kyi las dge ba rnam par dag par byed pa dang  sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348903#1348903#TD4037E.TXT.r_4477# rnam pa bdun ni phyi phyir zhing bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shas cher 'dun pa dang  smon pa rjes su 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'dun pa dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos rnams la mthun zhing rnal 'byor du gnas par 'gyur la / /
column19: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183411#1183414#TD4047E.TXT.r_8939# khyad par can gyi brtson 'grus kyi  sbyor ba'i rgyu MTHUN PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG LDAN pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column20: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1125252#1125253#TD4047E.TXT.r_559;TD4047E.TXT.r_560# dus kun du sbyor ba nyid ni rtag tu byed pa'i brtson 'grus te / / +des sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus la gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348633#1348633#TD4037E.TXT.r_4456;TD4037E.TXT.r_4457# phyin ci ma log cing don dang  LDAN PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG LDAN pa yin te / / +de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba'i brtson 'grus gsum pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column22: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968801#968801#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10081# chos tshol ba'i tshe 'bad pa dang rtsol ba dang zhum pa dang  'khrug pa MED PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS LA GNAS pas na brtson 'grus mchog  thob pa zhes bya ste / /
column23: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268782#1268783#TD4051E.TXT.r_5407# so so rang brtson 'grus mi 'dor bas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams brtson 'grus 'dor pa yongs su spang ba'i  phyir te / /
column24: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732146#1732146#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4396;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4397# 'di la dge slong dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams zhing gnas te / / +stobs dang LDAN PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG   spro ba dang  brtan pa dang pha rol gnon pa khur mi 'dor ba gang gis pags pa dang  rtsa rgyus dang  rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang  khrag skams kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang dang  stobs dang LDAN PA'I BRTSON 'GRUS DANG  spro ba dang  brtan  pa dang  pha rol gnon pa dang  khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te / /
column25: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2600776#2600776#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8131;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8132# mngon par brtson pa dang  lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par brtson pa ste / / +brtson 'grus med pa'i phyir dang  lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column7: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#43330#43333#TD4036E.TXT.r_6566;TD4036E.TXT.r_6567;TD4036E.TXT.r_6568# 'di ni rul ba dang  dri mi zhim pa dang  dri da ba yin no zhes des rnam pa de dag dang  de lta bu dang  mthun pa gang dag gis mi sdug pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos sngon thos pa de nyid kyi don so sor rtog par byed de / / +de ltar mi sdug pa nyid kyi don yongs su tshol bar byed do // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924577#924577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4335;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4336# bdag nyid tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la gnas pa bzhin du sems can gzhan yang tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la bkod    de de dang ldan par byas PAS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO // / +ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA YANG de ltar yang cung zad kyi gzhan yang YOD PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR / /

column13: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#36924#36924#TD4036E.TXT.r_5550;TD4036E.TXT.r_5551# rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas rab tu 'dzin par byed cing rab tu dga' bar byed pa ste / / +de ni sems rab TU 'DZIN PAR BYED PA yin no // /
column14: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136841#1136841#TD4047E.TXT.r_2244;TD4047E.TXT.r_2245# don che ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don rnam pa sna tshogs pa mang po byed mi nus pa'o // / +don khyad par can byed pa med pa'i phyir mthun pa ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /

column17: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#43133#43134#TD4036E.TXT.r_6526;TD4036E.TXT.r_6527;TD4036E.TXT.r_6528# 'di ltar da lta byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig da ltar yod do zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed do // / +ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / /

column19: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198230#1198230#TD4047E.TXT.r_10944# byed 'dod pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'jug pa nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gang ci yang rung ba'i rnam pas don de bsgrub par bya'o zhes nges par byed pa nyid ni byed 'dod pa nyid do // /
column20: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#877857#877857#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17911# nye bar rgyu bar byed pa yang ma yin pas zhes bya  ba ni yang dag par rtog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don te / /

column23: 0.024#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column24: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221506#1221506#TD4047E.TXT.r_14210;TD4047E.TXT.r_14211# dman pa la sogs pa rnams la rang gi don la sbyor BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR / / +de dag gis ma rtogs pa'i don yang rtogs par byed la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column25: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#367590#367590#TD4043E.TXT.r_1563# de la khyim ba ni rigs kyi 'du shes la sogs pa de dag gis don rnams ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang  pha dang ma la sogs pa dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gang gi don du yang dag par sgrub pa dang  de yongs su  gzung ba'i nyes pa 'khor ba yun ring du skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / /
column26: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor mi byed do zhes bya ba ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333250#1333250#TD4037E.TXT.r_2391;TD4037E.TXT.r_2392# byang chub sems  dpa' bsam par bya ba ma yin pa spong ba na rmongs pa dang sems gyengs par mi 'gyur ro // / +rtag tu gus par byed pa'i sbyor bas rgyun du sems par byed na sngon ma rtogs pa'i don khong du chud cing thob par 'gyur la / /

column29: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925393#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE na / /
column30: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2565034#2565035#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3649# de yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir skyed par  byed do zhes bya ba'i don te / /

column32: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#280276#280276#TD4026E.TXT.r_932# rjes su bstan pa dang  kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dag gis legs par ston pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis mgu bar byed pa dang  bstan  pa khas len du gzhug pa'i phyir 'jug pa dang  zhugs pa rnams kyi the tshom gtsod pa'i phyir don la rnam par nges par byed dang  dge ba'i RTSAB YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DANG  'doms pa dang  sems gnas par byed pa dang  shes rab rnam par grol bar byed pa dang  mngon bar shes  pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can rnams yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba dang  sa brgyad pa la lung bstan pa dang  sa bcu pa la dbang bskur ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o // /
column33: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1030242#1030242#TD4054E.TXT.r_6466;TD4054E.TXT.r_6467;TD4054E.TXT.r_6468# dpe dang bcas pa gsungs pa'o // / +des don  gsal bar byed PA'I PHYIR STE / / +mngon par gsal bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: bskal pa bye ba stong du skyo mi 'gyur // / +zhes smos te / / +sems can gcig gi sems  kyi rgyud kyi skad cig ma gcig la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba gcig bskyed pa'i phyir / /

dge pa bskyed par nus pa'i skabs gzigs na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang gshegs shing bskal pa bye ba brgya stong grangs med par yang sems can gyi don mdzad cing gshegs pa  la skyo ba mi mnga'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

de mi 'di skad du bstan ba yin te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can rnams la tshe 'dir phan btags pa dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#963512#963514#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9463# SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PAS na / / +yang sems can la phan btags pa dag gnod par byed  pa dang  nyes pa med par yang nyes par byed la / /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924204#924205#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4293;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4294# phan pa la bkod pa dang  tshe rabs  GZHAN DU PHAN BTAGS TE bde ba la BKOD PAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924036#924036#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4266;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4267# tshigs su bcad pa rtsom MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +de la  sbyin pa ci 'dra BAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE na / /

column3: de la brtson    'grus kyis tshe 'dir dge ba'i sems gcig la bkod pa ni tshe 'dir phan btags pa'o // /
column4: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925097#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2898623#2898624#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4296;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4297# de bas na lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa gsum la byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la brtson 'grus  lhun gyis grub pas na zhum pa'i 'jigs pa med do // /
column6: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874904#2874904#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1001;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1002# brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin dang  rgyu dang  'bras bu la sogs pa gong du bshad pa lta bu'i yin par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin du sgrub par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang ma 'dres shing bde ba la reg par spyod ces bya ba la gsungs so // /
column7: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349212#1349212#TD4037E.TXT.r_4508;TD4037E.TXT.r_4509# yang byang chub  sems dpa' zhi gnas dang  rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma rnams dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang  ldang ba'i mtshan ma rnams shes pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu byed cing / / +gus par byed pa 'di ni    byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i rgyus tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pa'o // /

column4: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919647#919647#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3714# zhing YONGS SU DAG PAR BYED PA LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA ZHES BYA BA LAS / /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925082#925083#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4403# brtson 'grus JI LTA BUS JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE las brtsams te / /
column6: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#283165#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# BSAM GTAN JI LTA BUS SEMS can RNAMS JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA / /

column3: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ston te / / +bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925469#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912823#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924892#924894#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims CI 'DRA BAS SEMS CAN ji LTAR SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922395#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi NUS PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914540#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam YANG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column18: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981742#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma YIN PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba SMIN PAR GYUR BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa NI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RNAMS mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column24: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1184120#1184120#TD4047E.TXT.r_9028;TD4047E.TXT.r_9029# bsam gtan la brten nas de'i stobs kyis sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don bdag gi lus sprul pa dus gcig tu spros pas sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang  phan pa byas pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i phyir du byed pa dang  'jigs pa  rnams las srung ba dang  sdug bsngal bar gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel ba dang  skrag par byed pa'i bar du'o // / +de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi sems can rnams kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o / /

column3: bsam  gtan ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na de'i phyir / / +yid kyis bla na med pa'i dbang bskur nas // /
zhes bya ba smos te / / +yid ni sems la bya ste / / +sems kyang rnam par shes pa kun la mi bya'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bya'o // /
column4: 0.022#TD4066E.TXT.r#2114292#2114293#TD4066E.TXT.r_1715;TD4066E.TXT.r_1716;TD4066E.TXT.r_1717;TD4066E.TXT.r_1718# de'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems dang yid kyang de yin te // / +zhes BYA BA SMOS TE / / +rnam par shes pa de ni sems zhes  kyang bya / /

column3: dbang ni ting nge 'dzin la bya  ste ; / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +ting nge 'dzin gyis sems mi gyeng bar rtse gcig tu 'jog par byed pas na ting nge 'dzin la dbang zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#985448#985448#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12215# dang po rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul la sems rtse gcig tu bzhag ste / /

column3: theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa thob par byas pa la / /
column4: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1879363#1879363#TD4039E.TXT.r_7529;TD4039E.TXT.r_7530# 'on kyang rgyud la yod pa'i legs par ma  brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus lhod pa gang yin pa de ni le lo dang ldan pa zhes bya ste / / +de ni ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir rnam pa lngas rnam pa thams cad du bsgom par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899581#2899581#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4446;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4447# gzungs kyis zin cing gzungs dang 'brel pa'o // / +de la ting nge 'dzin ni DPA' BAR 'GRO BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN LA SOGS PA ste / /
column6: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905767#905768#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1971# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin  dang ; / +dpa' BAR 'GRO BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG  nam mkha'i mdzod KYI TING NGE 'DZIN LA SOGS PA'I gnas su gyur bas na rin po che chen po'i rigs dang 'dra'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3083223#3083223#TD4018E.TXT.r_10296;TD4018E.TXT.r_10297;TD4018E.TXT.r_10298# nga dang gzhan gyis bshad pa'o //// / +zhes pa 'di ni dbu MA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO // / +rnam PAR SHES PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN NI ji ltar 'dir gsungs pa / /

column3: yid kyis  bla na med pa'i dbang bkur nas // / +zhes bya'o // / +de ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'phrul gyi mig dang  rna ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul rnams kyang sems can gyi don du byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
gzhan gyis mchod 'dod thams cad bcom nas  su ; / / +zhes bya ba la / /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#982160#982160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11755# de lta bu'i sems can de nyid brdeg btsog la sogs pa byed pa'i sgo nas 'jigs shing dngang bar byed na ni de ni 'gal BAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2933328#2933328#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9005# 'jig rten 'byor ba ma lus dang  zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la 'phral du srog dang srid pa bde bar 'gyur ba stobs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams brgya byin dang  tshangs pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba la sogs  pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la sems can 'god par byed cing de lta bu dag SBYIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932109#932110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5390# sprul pas sems can smin par byed LA YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925800#925801#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4502;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4503# sems can la thugs brtse ba'i RGYUS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +sus YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE na / /
column8: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141216#1141216#TD4047E.TXT.r_2890;TD4047E.TXT.r_2891# de lta bas na bdag nyid myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed kyi / / +sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'bad par byed sgrub par  byed do // /
column9: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924204#924204#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4293# phan pa la bkod pa dang  tshe rabs  gzhan du phan btags te bde ba la bkod PAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#43032#43032#TD4036E.TXT.r_6508;TD4036E.TXT.r_6509# yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag la so sor rtog par byed do // / +de la ji ltar don yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / /

column3: ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +gzhan yang mchog gi bstan la 'jug par byed // /
column4: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#974642#974643#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10796;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10797;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10798# de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa na don dang tshig gsal bar 'chad par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar gsal bar    MDZAD CE NA / / +de'i phyir gsal bar byed de / /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925820#925820#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4507;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4508# byang chub  sems DPAS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CES BYA ba'i don to // / +rnam pa du dang ji lta BUS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE NA / /
column6: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925181#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa RNAMS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#664094#664094#TD4069E.TXT.r_5821# de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang  du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so // /

column3: ces smos te / / +rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'bar pa dang 'phur ba la sogs pa bstan nas /// /
sems can gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang  mgu pa dang  dad pa skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
der yang ma zad kyi gzhan yang byed par bstan pa'i phyir / / +de dag dge ba yang dag 'phel bar byed // /
column4: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603075#2603075#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column5: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166207#1166207#TD4047E.TXT.r_6607# rgyal srid las kyang 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dge ba yin pa'i phyir ma byin par len par thal bar mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: ces bya ba smos te / / +sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa bskyed pa tsam du ma zad kyi dad pa yang bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod du yang bcug pas dge ba yang 'phel bar byed pa yin no // /
shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column4: 2.980#TD4026E.TXT.r#283220#283222#TD4026E.TXT.r_1405;TD4026E.TXT.r_1406# gzhan sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'dun par  byed pa dang  'dun par byas pa la dge ba'i chos spel ba'i sgo NAS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO // / +shes RAB JI LTA BUS JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA / /
column5: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#282866#282868#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# sbyin pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar  YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA / /
column6: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems CAN JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE LAS BRTSAMS TE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA / /

column3: da ni shes rab kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ston te / / +de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925283#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra BAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912824#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924029#924029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4265;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4266# de yang sbyin pa ji lta bu btang nas sems can rnams ji LTAR SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR / / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924250#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra BAS SEMS CAN JI LTAR SMIN PAR BYED PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905353#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying RJE YONGS SU SMIN PA YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922395#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi NUS PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911025#911025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so ZHES BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba SMIN PAR GYUR BA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column22: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934810#934810#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5782;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5783# chos kyi dbyings la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i bsdus pa'i don NI SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA LA / /
column24: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915711#915711#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3202# phyin ci log de skyon yin pas spang dgos BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#975450#975452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10945# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldem po dag la phyi nang du YOD BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA gnyis rtsom  MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column26: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889222#2889224#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3020;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3021# byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang YIN PA BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA  gnyis RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column27: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#282866#282867#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# sbyin PA JI LTA BUS SEMS CAN rnams ji ltar  YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column28: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus JI LTA BUS SEMS CAN JI LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA DE las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column29: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal BAR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal BAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column30: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par BYA BA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column31: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher BSHAD PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column32: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO // /
column33: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896716#896716#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_957# da theg pa chen po mu stegs dang rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma YIN PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin  par byed ce na / /
de'i phyir / / +de nyid dgongs pa'i tshul la de nges pas // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +de nyid kyi tshul la nges pa dang dgongs tshul la nges pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
de la gang zag la bdag med pa dang  chos la bdag ming pa gnyis ni de nyid kyi tshul zhes bya ste / /
byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab kyis chos de la the tshom med par byas shing gtan la phab par byas pa ni de nyid kyi tshul la nges par byed pa zhes bya'o // /
don gzhan la dgongs pa dang dus gzhan la dgongs ba la sogs pa dgongs pa bzhi dang ldem por dgongs pa bzhi la  ni dgongs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2948427#2948428#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11139;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11140# de la dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'brel  ba'i rang bzhin ni so so yang dag par rig PA BZHI DANG LDAN PAS / / +de bzhin gshegs PA'I DGONGS PA BZHI DANG  LDEM PO DGONGS PA BZHI LA SOGS pa phyin ci ma log pa'i bar ma chad par byed pa ste / /

column3: chos de dag la the tshom med par byas pa ni dgongs pa'i tshul la nges pa zhes bya'o // /
tshig 'dis bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyi yon tan la gnas par bstan to // / +ji ltar sems can the tshom bsal nas yongs su smin par byed ce  na ; /
de'i phyir / / +sems can the tshom shin tu sel bar byed // / +ces bya ba smos te / /
de ltar bdag nyid the tshom med par byas nas sems can rnams de kho na'i tshig dang  dgongs pa'i tshul la the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom bsal nas the tshom med pa la dgod par byed kyi / /
column4: 0.028#TD4097E.TXT.r#2224574#2224574#TD4097E.TXT.r_2943;TD4097E.TXT.r_2944# so sor zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyab par 'dod pa'i tshig ste / / +sems can sems can zhes so sor gnas pa'o // /

column3: de lta    bu'i tshul gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed do // / +'dis ni sems can gzhan dag ye shes kyi tshogs la bkod pa bstan to // /
tshig de dag ni mjug bsdu ba'i phyir / / +de'i phyir rgyal ba'i bstan la de gus pas // /
bdag dang pha rol dge ba'i yon tan 'phel // / +zhes  bya ba smos te / /
sems can rnams de nyid kyi tshul dang  dgongs pa'i tshu la the tshom med par byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gus pa dang dad pa dang rim gro bskyed do // /
de bas na byang chub sems dpa' des bdag gi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel  bar byas pha rol gyi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel bar byas so // /
ji ltar zhe na / / +de nyid dang dgongs pa'i tshul la the tshom med pas na bdag dge ba'i yon tan 'phel bar byas so // /
column4: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836807#1836807#TD4039E.TXT.r_2689# nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis bdag gi yon tan gleng ba'am brten pa'i tshul kun du spyod pas tshig gi lam 'jam po kun du spyod pa ni kha gsag go // /

column3: de nyid dang dgongs pa'i tshul la sems can gzhan the tshom bsal bas pha rol kyang dge  ba'i yon tan la 'phel bar byas so // /

mjug bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900163#900165#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914541#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column11: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column12: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column13: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column14: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943660#943660#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6891;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6892# de ltar theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa bsod nams che bar bstan nas spyir ni theg pa chen po'i chos  la mos pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pas 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi mdor bsdus na 'di dag 'thob po zhes bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO / / +tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni gang du mos pa dang  gang gis mas  pa dang  ji lta bus mos pa dang  mos pa'i 'bras bus gang yongs su 'dzin pa de ston to // /
column15: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#935091#935091#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5830;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5831# bu bla na med pa'i byang chub nyid thob pa ni ngo mtshar chen por bya ba ma yin NO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni dus gcig sgo mang po NAS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYA BA'I thabs kyi rgyud du ma yod par ston to // /
column16: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column17: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#935343#935343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5861;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5862# mi nyams la gyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phrin las de dag thams cad kyang mdzad DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems can smin par sbyor zhing mdzad pa'i  rgyu zag pa med pa'i dbyings rtog pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa de ston te / /
column18: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la GCES PAR BYED DO ZHES BSHAD pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la GCES PAR BYED DO ZHES BSTAN pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column19: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924896#924896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4375# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di LTAR SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BSTAN pa'i PHYIR TSHIGS SU BCAD PA RTSOM MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +bzod pa ci 'dra BAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE na / /
column20: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#760309#760310#TD4079E.TXT.r_639;TD4079E.TXT.r_640# de dag ni rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa la smad ba STE TSHIGS SU BCAD PA GSUM pa'i don to // / +de las 'das pa'i bsngags pa NI TSHIGS SU BCAD PA BZHI BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#929962#929962#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5068# snod chag pa lta bu'i sems can ngan pas bdag la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod kyang mi mthong NGO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sangs rgyas mthong bar     // /

column3: sems can gang du 'dul zhing smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +ji ltar bde 'gror 'gro ba dge gsum mam // /
zhes bya ba smos te / / +ji ltar zhes bya  ba ni gong du bshad pa ltar na gong du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
gang zag rigs med pa rnams ni dge ba bcu spyod du bcug cing lha dang mi'i bde 'gro'i gnas su bkod cing yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
gang zag nyan thos kyi rigs can nam rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can nam / / +sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dag ni dge ba la bkod par byed de dge ba gsum ni theg pa gsum la bya ste / /
de la nyan thos kyi rigs can ni nyan thos kyi theg par bkod cing yongs su smin par byed / / +rang     // /
sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la bkod cing yongs su smin par byed / / +sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni theg pa chen po la yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

su dag yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +'gro bam  lus zhes bya ba smos te / / +rigs med pa dang  nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can la sogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925393#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE NA / /
column5: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor MI BYED DO ZHES BYA BA ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi BYED PA'O ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726355#2726359#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3624;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3625;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3626# rna ba ni sgra sna tshogs dag nyan PAR BYED DO // / +legs par gsungs pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kyang shes par  yang byed do // /
column7: 0.018#TD4095E.TXT.r#93470#93471#TD4095E.TXT.r_5929;TD4095E.TXT.r_5930# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i chos thos pa 'dzin pa'am don nyan PAR BYED DO // / +thos pas phyin ci ma log par sems PAR BYED DO // /
column8: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column9: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#664093#664094#TD4069E.TXT.r_5821# de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang  du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so // /
column10: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par MI BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON GANG yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa RNAMS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +da ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3044933#3044937#TD4018E.TXT.r_5317;TD4018E.TXT.r_5318# brjod pa'i  don chud PAR BYED LA / / +byed pa dang byed pa por mngon par 'brel par yang chud par byed do // /
column13: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925819#925820#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4507;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4508# byang chub  sems DPAS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +rnam pa du dang ji lta BUS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE NA / /
column14: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#965271#965272#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9675# byed pa dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la 'jug PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I  don to // /
column15: 0.023#TD4018E.TXT.r#3032516#3032516#TD4018E.TXT.r_3742# ri bong gi rva med pa dang  sbom po'i phyi'i rdzas ba glang gi rva yod do snyam du rtog pa blo gros chen po de dag yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis kyi  lta bar lhung zhing rang gi sems kyi khams kyi yul du rnam par rtog pa gang yod pa des dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tha snyad rnams brtas par byed de 'phel bar byed CES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column16: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1538032#1538032#TD4061E.TXT.r_3448;TD4061E.TXT.r_3449;TD4061E.TXT.r_3450# mi mthun par mi byed / / +sbyor bar byed / / +gnod par mi byed / /
column17: 0.024#TD4070E.TXT.r#2818483#2818483#TD4070E.TXT.r_2560;TD4070E.TXT.r_2561# 'dzin pa gnyis kyi bag chags med par las kyi bag chags 'ba' zhig gis rnam par smin pa skyed mi nus so zhes bya bar 'gyur  ro ;; / +de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don de nyid bstan par byed do // /
column18: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891070#891070#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_289# gang la brgyan PAR BYED CE NA / / +theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don dang  tshig la brgyan par byed do // /
column19: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2564984#2564984#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3642;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3643# rgyud GNAS PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun brgyud pas GNAS PAR BYED DO ZHES  BYA BA'I DON TO // / +zhing du SGRUB PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA ni las bdag nyid skye ba dang MTHUN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I THA tshig go // /
column20: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776095#776095#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1540;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1541# 'dis dngos po rnams sgrogs par byed pa ste / / +gcod par byed CES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column21: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125703#3125703#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4741;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4742# des  kyang de byed la / / +mi byed na yang le los yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column22: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1722612#1722612#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3328# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du ston pa'i mdun du yang bdag gis bshad pa la dge slong  'di phyir zlog par byed khong khro bar byed cing tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang bdag gis bshad pa la / /
column23: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#43330#43330#TD4036E.TXT.r_6566;TD4036E.TXT.r_6567# 'di ni rul ba dang  dri mi zhim pa dang  dri da ba yin no zhes des rnam pa de dag dang  de lta bu dang  mthun pa gang dag gis mi sdug pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos sngon thos pa de nyid kyi don so sor rtog PAR BYED DE / / +de ltar mi sdug pa nyid kyi don yongs su tshol bar byed do // /

column3: rgyu gang gis yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +snying rje zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891526#891526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_353;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_354# ci'i phyir brgyan par byed / / +rgyu gang gis brgyan par byed / /

column3: sems can la thugs brtse ba'i rgyus sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925392#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs NAS SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // / +ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE na / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#982160#982160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11755# de lta bu'i sems can de nyid brdeg btsog la sogs pa byed pa'i sgo nas 'jigs shing dngang bar byed na ni de ni 'gal BAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2933328#2933328#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9005# 'jig rten 'byor ba ma lus dang  zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la 'phral du srog dang srid pa bde bar 'gyur ba stobs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams brgya byin dang  tshangs pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba la sogs  pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la sems can 'god par byed cing de lta bu dag SBYIN PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: sus yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +byang chub sems dpas de zhes bya ba smos te / /
yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin te / / +byang chub  sems dpas yongs su smin par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
rnam pa du dang ji lta bus yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +chung dang mchog dang 'bring gi rnam pa yis // /
column4: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726358#2726359#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3625;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3626# legs par gsungs pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kyang shes par  yang byed do // / +mngon par brjod pas tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do // /
column5: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#93470#93471#TD4095E.TXT.r_5929;TD4095E.TXT.r_5930# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i chos thos pa 'dzin pa'am don nyan PAR BYED DO // / +thos pas phyin ci ma log par sems PAR BYED DO // /
column6: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2564984#2564984#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3642;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3643# rgyud gnas par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun brgyud pas gnas par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +zhing du sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni las bdag nyid skye ba dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column7: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#1538032#1538032#TD4061E.TXT.r_3448;TD4061E.TXT.r_3449;TD4061E.TXT.r_3450# mi mthun par mi byed / / +sbyor bar byed / / +gnod par mi byed / /
column8: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925766#925767#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4496# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni theg pa chen po LA YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +su DAG YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED CE NA / /
column9: 0.023#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column10: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor mi byed do zhes bya ba ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2028265#2028265#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7271;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7272# 'di ltar des ni khams de mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu rnam par sun 'byin par byed cing / / +rnam par gtong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column13: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830513#830513#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10596;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10597# rga bas ni rgas par byed do zhes  bya bas ni stobs chung BAR BYED DE / / +'jig pa la mngon du phyogs par gnas par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891070#891070#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_289# gang la brgyan PAR BYED CE NA / / +theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don dang  tshig la brgyan par byed do // /
column15: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#43414#43414#TD4036E.TXT.r_6579;TD4036E.TXT.r_6580# phyi rol la yang phyi rol du gtogs pa'i rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis mi sdug pa nyid du mos PAR BYED DE / / +de la rnam par bsngos par  mos PAR BYED PA NI / /
column16: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994494#1994494#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2279;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2280# 'dir tshogs par byed pas na tshogs pa yin te / / +skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa RNAMS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji LTAR YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED PA bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2063411#2063411#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12357;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12358# gtod par byed dam zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed ces bya ba 'dis ga las she na / /

column3: zhes bya ba smos te / / +mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzung  'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas chung bas bdag nyid kyang chung ba zhes bya bas / /
gzhan mos pas spyod pa'i sar bkod nas gzung 'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chung du la bzhag pas chung du'i rnam pas yongs su  smin par byed pa zhes bya'o // /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa la gnas pa la gnas pa'i dus na bdag nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i lhun gyis grub pa rnyed nas / /
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la gnas la gzhan yang sa  de gsum la bkod na / /
rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa thob par byas pa dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la bzhag pas mchog gi rnam pas yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o // /

nam byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po nas bdun pa man chad la gnas pa'i    dus na bdag nyid kyang 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas la / /

sems can gzhan dag kyang sa de dag la bkod na 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi  tshogs la bkod pa 'bring gi rnam pas sems can yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o // /
dus ji srid cig tu sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +'jig rten yod dang mnyam par 'jug pas 'dul // /
zhes bya ba smos te / / +nam mkha'i mtha' ji srid du yod par sems  can gyi khams kyang nge srid du yod do // /
'jig rten gyi khams ji srid du yod par sems can gyi khams kyang de srid du yod de / / +sems can gyi khams yod kyi bar du sems can yongs su smin par byed pas na / /
'jig rten yod dang mnyam par 'jug pas 'dul // / +zhes bya'o // / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918189#918192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3522;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524# myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// /

column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915092#915093#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3125# bam po dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +sgrub pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column8: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912359#912363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2754;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2755# bskyed pa lhag par bya ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column9: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2141544#2141546#TD4029E.TXT.r_2728;TD4029E.TXT.r_2729;TD4029E.TXT.r_2730# 'di skad du kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhes bshad pa yin no // / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column10: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151112#2151114#TD4029E.TXT.r_3984;TD4029E.TXT.r_3985;TD4029E.TXT.r_3986# de bzhin du brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyang sbyar bar bya'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column11: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2154314#2154314#TD4029E.TXT.r_4421;TD4029E.TXT.r_4422# mchod pa dang brten pa dang tshad med pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +tshad med pa'i 'og tu ngo tsha ba'i skabs te // /
