column3: da ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa dang  sa dang po la gnas pa dang  sa gnyis la sogs pa bsgom pa'i sa la gnas pa'i 'bras bu'i tshigs     // /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2943387#2943387#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10412# theg pa chen pos kun bsdus pas rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su  bcad pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la de ltar theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid chen po dang ldan pa rnams ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brten nas // /

column3: su bcad pa gcig gis bstan te / / +de bas na / / +de ltar rtag tu dge ba dag ni 'phel rdzogs shing // /
rab tu rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems 'thob cing // / +thub pa las ni rtag tu gdams pa che thob nas // /
sems dpa' mchog gi yon tan rgyal mtsho'i pha rol 'gro // /

zhes bya  ba smos te / / +sa dang po mos pa'i sar bskal pa grangs med pa gcig gi bar du bsod nams kyi tshogs rtag tu bsags pa dang  de nas sa gnyis nas sa bdun gyi bar du bsod nams kyi tshogs rtag tu bsags pa dang  sa brgyad nas sa bcu pa'i bar du bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu bsod nams  kyi tshogs rtag tu bsags pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas pas na dge ba dag 'phel zhing rdzogs bar byas te / /
column4: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1207109#1207110#TD4047E.TXT.r_12242;TD4047E.TXT.r_12243# dang pos ni dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos pas rab tu dang ba'i bya ba byed do // / +dpag tu med PA'I BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS YONGS su 'dzin pa'i sbyor bas tshogs thams  cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byed pa'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4009E.TXT.r#327850#327851#TD4009E.TXT.r_1131# bdud las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir phyir rgol ba med pa dang  tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa la gnas pa la sogs pas longs spyod pa kha nam thob med pa dang  BSOD NAMS KYI CHOGS DPAG TU med PAS BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS MI zad pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199430#2199430#TD4046E.TXT.r_478;TD4046E.TXT.r_479# bslab pa'i dngos po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa bsdus  pas na tshul khrims kyi phung po'o // / +bsod nams dpag tu med pa'i tshogs bsdus PAS NA BSOD NAMS KYI phung po'o // /
column7: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1173182#1173187#TD4047E.TXT.r_7601;TD4047E.TXT.r_7602# bslab pa'i dngos po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa bsdus pas na tshul khrims kyi phung po'o / / +bsod nams dpag tu med pa'i tshogs bsdus PAS NA BSOD NAMS KYI phung po'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#202309#202310#TD4035E.TXT.r_13486# skyes bu dam pa rnams dang  sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs  rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang  gal te tshul khrims dang  zang zing gi sbyin pas BSDUS PA'I BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS DANG  chos kyi sbyin pas bsdus pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyis / /
column9: 0.027#TD4043E.TXT.r#360488#360488#TD4043E.TXT.r_670# dge slong 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin  pa dang ; /
column10: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1122127#1122127#TD4047E.TXT.r_91# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid ji ltar rigs PAR BSOD RNAMS KYI TSHOGS DANG ye shes kyi tshogs yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i PHYIR BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS DANG ye shes kyi tshogs ZHES BYA BA GSUNGS TE / /
column11: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#308120#308120#TD4026E.TXT.r_6040;TD4026E.TXT.r_6041# BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS DANG  ye shes kyi tshogs so // / +de LA BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS  kyis ni 'khor ba na mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2902978#2902978#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4913;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4914# GCIG NI BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS LA bya ste / / +bsod nams  tshogs kyis ni 'khor ba skye bar 'khor ba na yang sems can kun las 'phags pa brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.029#TD4012E.TXT.r#1591119#1591119#TD4012E.TXT.r_455# bsod nams dang ye  shes kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i chogs thob pas mi zad pa'i mdzod rnyed pa ste 'di ni rnam pa bcu pa'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1380667#1380667#TD4037E.TXT.r_8536# de ltar nus na gzhan gyi the tshom gcod pas  bsod nams kyis mngon par skye zhing BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS YONGS su rdzogs par byed do // /
column15: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1232033#1232033#TD4047E.TXT.r_15724# de ltar nus na gzhan gyi the tshom gcod pas bsod nams kyis mngon par skye zhing BSOD NAMS KYI TSHOGS YONGS su RDZOGS PAR BYED DE / /

column3: 'dis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs bar bstan to // / +rab tu rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin  kyang thob ces bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.026#TD4050E.TXT.r#1118233#1118233#TD4050E.TXT.r_3012;TD4050E.TXT.r_3013# blo LDAN ZHES BYA BA NI BYANG chub sems dpa'o // / +zhi BA THOB PA ZHES BYA BA NI TING nge 'dzin THOB PA ZHES BYA BA'I DON TE nang gi bdag nyid kyi'o // /

column3: der yang ma zad kyis de dag la gnas pa'i tshe theg pa chen po'i gtams pa dang gdams pa yang 'thob ste / /

des ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bstan to // / +de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i sems dpa'i mchog byang chub  sems dpa' des sangs kyi sar yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro ste / /
column4: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918174#918174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3521# yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DE myur du stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs PA'I YON TAN RGYA MTSHO'I PHA ROL 'GRO ste / /

column3: don du na stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'tshang rgya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918174#918174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3521# yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de myur DU STOBS DANG MI 'JIGS PA LA SOGS PA'I YON TAN RGYA mtsho'i pha rol 'gro ste / /

column3: bsdu ba ste zhes bya ba la / / +gang la bslab pa dang  ji ltar bslab pa dang  gang gis bslab  pa gsum las / /
column4: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2868175#2868176#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3# gong du gang la bslab pa dang  JI LTAR BSLAB PA DANG  GANG GIS BSLAB PA GSUM LAS 'DI YANG JI LTAR BSLAB PA'I skabs yin te / /

column3: ji ltar bslab pa'i don bsdus na 'di rnams ston to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
mos pa dang ni mang po dang / / +chos tshol ba dang bshad pa dang / / +de bzhin du ni sgrub pa dang / / +yang dag gdams shing rjes su bstan // /

zhes bya ba la / / +ji ltar bslab par bya ba'i skabs las 'di  yan chad du mos pa mang ba dang  chos tshol ba dang  chos bshad pa dang  de bzhin du bsgrub pa dang  yang dag par gtams shing rjes su bstan pa ste / /
